overview: According to legend, there is a type of person who can walk in the yin and yang and know ghosts and spirits. Shen Xiaohan adhered to Master's last wish and escorted Master's ashes back to his hometown for burial. On the way home, he passed a family and learned that there was a ghost here, and the owner Wu Laohan was deeply hurt by it. Wu Laohan knew about the ghosts. With the ability, he asked Master Xiao Shen to come to exorcise the ghosts...
title: Fox's Strange Talk
